name: Blorpus's Adventure
description:
Blorpus wants to visit their friend Zoey's house. However, due to poor oversight by the city council, the road to Zoey's house has become dangerous and winding, with spike pits there because why not. Help Blorpus get to their friend's house!

The game is compatible with an Xbox GamePad, use the Left Stick to move and press Y to jump, otherwise, Keyboard controls are listed on the Title Screen.
